= Introduction =

sibebar的相关配置均在Commands.properties文件中。


= Details =

 * sidebar.show=0  # Set show(1) or hide(0) to SciTE start
 * sidebar.dock=0 # Set whether sidebar auto docking
 * sidebar.position=right
 * sidebar.foreground=#000000 # sidebar color
 * sidebar.background=#FFFFFF
 * project.opendir.buildtags=1 # Project build tags
